attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239377. The Akera Auto AWD is the boss of the Mazda CX-5 with all the bells and whistles that you could possibly want in a compact SUV. The strong 2.2l Diesel engine will not only help you save on fuel costs but it will also give you that little bit of extra power when you need to put the foot down. The CX-5 Akera showcases a number of cosmetic extras as well like a tilt and slide sunroof, push start, keyless entry, leather interior, front and read PDCs, LED headlights, cruise control, electric windows and mirrors. The multi-functioning steering wheel will give you a sense of convenience without having to take your hands of the steering wheel. This compact SUV has been kept in immaculate condition, it is an absolute beauty!! Do not miss the opportunity to test drive this incredible SUV

Trade Ins Welcome. Finance Available.
Certified Roadworthy Pre-owned.
